          Determines value of all the stock the User owns

Uses of InvalidPriceOperation in price
 

Methods in price that throw InvalidPriceOperation
 Price Price.add(Price p)
          Adds current price object to the price object passed in.
 Price Price.multiply(int p)
          Multiplies the current Price object by the integer passed in.
